title: Tom Pidcock on Q36.5 and Moving Past Ineos: ‘100 Percent the Right Decision’
content:
The British superstar speaks about his blockbuster transfer from Ineos to Q36.5: 'The mutual solution to end the contract was the best option.'

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock on Q36.5 and Moving Past Ineos: ‘100 Percent the Right Decision’ on Velo.
author: ahood
